texts.shortText:
Balasubramanian, CP & Suseelan, C (1998). Natural diet of the deep water crab Charybdis smithii McLeay (Brachyura: Portunidae) of the seas around India. Indian Journal of Fisheries, 45(4), 407-412.

Balasubramanian, CP & Suseelan, C (2001). Distribution and population structure of deep-water crab Charybdis smithii (Decapoda: Portunidae) in the Arabian Sea and Bay of Bengal. Bulletin of Marine Science, 68(3), 435-449.

Barnard, KH (1950). Descriptive Catalogue of South African Decapod Crustacea. Annals of the South African Museum, 38, 1–824.

Branch, G, Griffiths, CL, Branch, M & Beckley, L (2016). Two Oceans: A Guide to the Marine Life of Southern Africa (Fourth edition). Struik Nature, Cape Town. (p. 122).

Emmerson, WD (2016). A Guide to, and Checklist for, the Decapoda of Namibia, South Africa and Mozambique. Newcastle upon Tyne: Cambridge Scholars Publishing. Volumes 1 – 3, 526, 645, 711 pp.

Losse, GF (1969). Notes on the portunid crab Charybdis edwardsi Leene & Buitendijk, 1949, from the Western Indian Ocean. Journal of Natural History, 3(1), 145-152.
